description:
Ever been to the Purcell Mountain Range? If you wore this toque, you’d blend right in with your surroundings. The Purcell is a best-seller and Ambler Family favourite for its jacquard design that depicts the majestic mountains of the Purcell Mountain Range.

  • Made with 100% wool
  • Fleece headband lining for added comfort & warmth
  • Handmade in Nepal
name: Ambler Purcell Toque - Unisex
